description: This file defines a Flutter widget named GestureBoardContainer that encapsulates gesture detection for a child widget, facilitating swipe-based move actions in a 2048 game. It uses the provider package to access the game state and a custom SwipeDetector widget to handle swipe gestures.

classes.name: GestureBoardContainer
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that provides swipe gesture detection for its child widget, enabling movement commands for a 2048 game.

methods.name: GestureBoardContainer
methods.description: Constructor for GestureBoardContainer, requiring a child widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, setting up SwipeDetector to listen for swipe gestures and invoke corresponding game movement methods.
